note: Phil Hopkins manages online resources for the Pasadena Media Foundation. He has written, photographed and edited for news outlets including United Press International, the San Diego Union/Tribune, the La Jolla Light and Journal, The Cousteau Society, Rx Home Care magazine, Personal Computer Age, Newsbytes News Service, Hospital Information Management magazine and Arcade magazine, among others. Phil also has a three decades-long career as a technology leader for large corporations and government.
